data.persona: I was married to the king at a young age. I control how the functions of the royal house. I am pressured into producing an heir to the king.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Entrance.
The palace entrance is majestic and well built. There are beautiful decorations from all over the world from the greatest artists. It is mostly gold and pretty colors.
The noble and the prince are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the noble because he's my best friend.
data.mid_motivation: The noble is going to smuggle me out of the castle tonight.
data.long_motivation: I want to run away with the noble, and have our own home to start a new life together by the end of the month.
